task.id: Update your address already provided in MyPack Portal

shortdesc: Students can update their personal information in MyPack Portal

taskbody.prereq: Must be enrolled as a student Must have a Mypack Portal account
taskbody.steps:
Log into Mypack Portal Go online to Mypack Portal log in web page
Once logged in select the Personal Information tile
On the left-hand navigation menu, select Addresses. Under the Header select Home Address.
Update the address fileds as needed.
Click the green Save button to save your updates
